column1: -t is a Quenya suffix that has three meanings.

column2: denoting a pair of something (e.g. m√°ryat "her (pair of) hands").
seen in the word laituvalmet "we shall bless them" (lait-uva-lme-t "bless-shall-we-them"). Also independent word te.
